fieldHint.hint1: Ex: beginning writer, insurance agent, public speaker

fields.fieldTitle: What's a big NEED they have right now?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: need to make money quickly, need more clients, need more speaking gigs

fields.fieldTitle: What do they really WANT right now?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: want to get paid to write, want to sell more insurance, want to make more money from stage

fields.fieldTitle: Hard job they know they have to do, but dread or don't know how

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: finding people and places to pay you to write, prospecting for business, networking with meeting planners

fields.fieldTitle: What are you sending them to in this teaser?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: new video, ebook, article, 5-Star course

fields.fieldTitle: What's the title of what you're sending them to?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How Can a Newbie Make Money Writing, Prospecting Secrets, 10 Speaking Tips

fields.fieldTitle: Specifically how does this address their needs / pain?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: shows you how and where to get paid to write quickly, explains pain-free prospecting techniques, gives you endless networking ideas

fields.fieldTitle: Specifically how does this help them get what they want?

fieldHint.hint1: "To make your life easier, this product / service ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: shows you exactly where to find these people and sites that will pay you to write, gives a step by step daily prospecting plan, shows you how to plan the perfect pitch

fields.fieldTitle: URL link to product, video, etc.
